articles.author: Parker Gabriel, USA TODAY
articles.title: Russell Wilson quarterback coach Jake Heaps joins Broncos QB in Denver - USA TODAY
articles.description: Jake Heaps, Russell Wilson's personal QB coach, is moving from his home base of Seattle to Denver to work with the Broncos quarterback full-time.
articles.content:
PARKER, Colo. – On Thursday morning, Jake Heaps spent four hours on the radio airwaves in Seattle, wrapping up his final day as the co-host of a mid-day sports show.
